projectGridLines.stationName: ITILITE Technologies Private Limited - Social Media Marketing
projectGridLines.title: Title: Social Media Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Social Media Intern

Description: Strategizing and executing campaigns across all the social media handles of Itilite

Skill sets: Creative thinking, product understanding and basic marketing attributes (not mandatory) 

Traits expectation: Go-getter and self-motivated individual 

Expected learning: A complete exposure to the social/online and event marketing of the company

Specific courses required for project execution:  Not required
